title: Alt-tab
body: Alt-tabbing causes game to freeze then go into a black screen for at least 5 seconds before it goes back to normal.

replies.body: That can happen due to how much your pc needs to put on hold while the desktop loads back up. Faster pc's might be able to do this quicker and smoother, so I'd suggest trying not to close the game by alt+tabbing as much if it's giving you issues.
